info.title: Azure Log Analytics Query Packs
info.description: Azure Log Analytics API reference for management of saved Queries within Query Packs.

get.description: Gets a list of Queries defined within a Log Analytics QueryPack.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: queryPackName
parameters.description: The name of the Log Analytics QueryPack resource.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Maximum items returned in page.

parameters.name: includeBody
parameters.description: Flag indicating whether or not to return the body of each applicable query. If false, only return the query information.

parameters.name: $skipToken
parameters.description: Base64 encoded token used to fetch the next page of items. Default is null.

200.description: A list containing 0 or more queries contained within the Log Analytics QueryPack.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Search a list of Queries defined within a Log Analytics QueryPack according to given search properties.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: queryPackName
parameters.description: The name of the Log Analytics QueryPack resource.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Maximum items returned in page.

parameters.name: includeBody
parameters.description: Flag indicating whether or not to return the body of each applicable query. If false, only return the query information.

parameters.name: $skipToken
parameters.description: Base64 encoded token used to fetch the next page of items. Default is null.

requestBody.description: Properties by which to search queries in the given Log Analytics QueryPack.

200.description: A list containing 0 or more queries contained within the Log Analytics QueryPack.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets a specific Log Analytics Query defined within a Log Analytics QueryPack.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: queryPackName
parameters.description: The name of the Log Analytics QueryPack resource.

parameters.name: queryId
parameters.description: The id of a specific query defined in the Log Analytics QueryPack

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

200.description: A single query contained within the Log Analytics QueryPack.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Adds or Updates a specific Query within a Log Analytics QueryPack.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: queryPackName
parameters.description: The name of the Log Analytics QueryPack resource.

parameters.name: queryId
parameters.description: The id of a specific query defined in the Log Analytics QueryPack

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

requestBody.description: Properties that need to be specified to create a new query and add it to a Log Analytics QueryPack.

200.description: The new or updated query contained within the Log Analytics QueryPack.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes a specific Query defined within an Log Analytics QueryPack.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: queryPackName
parameters.description: The name of the Log Analytics QueryPack resource.

parameters.name: queryId
parameters.description: The id of a specific query defined in the Log Analytics QueryPack

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

200.description: The query has been successfully removed from the Log Analytics QueryPack

204.description: The specified query or associated QueryPack does not exist.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

ErrorResponse.description: Describe the format of an Error response.

nextLink.description: The URI to get the next set of Log Analytics QueryPack definitions if too many QueryPack-Queries where returned in the result set.

value.description: List of Log Analytics QueryPack Query definitions.

LogAnalyticsQueryPackQueryListResult.description: Describes the list of Log Analytics QueryPack-Query resources.

author.description: Object Id of user creating the query.

displayName.description: Unique display name for your query within the Query Pack.

linkedResourceId.description: Resource id associated with the query.

queryId.description: The unique ID of your application. This field cannot be changed.

resourceTypes.description: Resource Types associated with the query.

timeCreated.description: Creation Date for the Log Analytics Query, in ISO 8601 format.

timeModified.description: Last modified date of the Log Analytics Query, in ISO 8601 format.

LogAnalyticsQueryPackQueryProperties.description: Properties that define an Log Analytics QueryPack-Query resource.

resourceTypes.description: Resource Types associated with the query.

LogAnalyticsQueryPackQuerySearchProperti.description: Properties that define an Log Analytics QueryPack-Query search properties.

ContinuationTokenParameter.name: $skipToken
ContinuationTokenParameter.description: Base64 encoded token used to fetch the next page of items. Default is null.

IncludeBodyParameter.name: includeBody
IncludeBodyParameter.description: Flag indicating whether or not to return the body of each applicable query. If false, only return the query information.

QueryIdParameter.name: queryId
QueryIdParameter.description: The id of a specific query defined in the Log Analytics QueryPack

QueryPackNameParameter.name: queryPackName
QueryPackNameParameter.description: The name of the Log Analytics QueryPack resource.
